reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater incredibly soft, cozy, and perfect for winter occasions, with one mentioning it's great for layering on freezing days. They appreciate its style, with one noting it can be dressed up or down, and its quality, with one customer saying it doesn't feel cheap. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some love the oversized fit, others find it too large. The fabric quality also gets mixed review

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars chunky turtle neck sweater dress
items.body: this chunky turtle sweater tunic/dress is super cute. i wore it with black tights and knee high boots and it was a very cute holiday fit! granted i like my dresses pretty short it covered everything that it needed to cover. i am 5’ 5’ and about 165-170 and it wasn’t inappropriately short as a dress.. granted i wore tights and shorts under it.. that was just preference since i was going to be playing games and helping out on the holidays! one thing to note the turtle neck is super thick i always have to cut an inch or two off before wearing them but if you like that big chunky neck and can handle it, it definitely is super cute!! the material isn’t super luxurious, soft, and plump but it definitely isn’t see-through, scratchy, or cheapy feeling. NOTE: mine did come vacuum packed so when you open it up it’s incredibly wrinkly and the dryer does not get it all out sometimes i don’t have time to wash and dry things when i need to wear them but this is something you will have to take the time and do! Read more
items.author: Shaye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Very nice quality. Very heavy! The neck is tighter than it looks but comfortable. Read more
items.author: April Simank

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oversized sweater
items.body: Great oversized sweater for this price. Very soft and comfortable. I ordered XL and it’s more like a dress which I love. I’m 5’7 and 140 pounds. Read more
items.author: Irina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Wedding Sweatet
items.body: Beautiful color. Good fit. Length is perfect. Read more
items.author: pat olson-mcgee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Are $15 more this year from last year - nope!
items.body: These sweaters have really held up. They are warm and cozy! I wash on cold and line dry. I’ve come back this year to buy additional colors but they are $15 more this year so no thanks! Read more
items.author: D. Cummings

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winter sweater
items.body: Nice sweater. Unfortunately I returned it. I wasn’t a good look for me Read more
items.author: Denise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oversize fit..
items.body: This sweater has a nice fit not too bulky due to fabric used...Love the quality especially for the price,look or style,fit,softness and warmth of it ,works well in the South Dakota winter with a t-shirt under..I read the reviews which helped..this sweater is not for a short person for sure unless you want a sweater dress.. Read more
items.author: Vikibydesign

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sweater weather
items.body: The sweater is not this oversized, but because I needed it the day of I kept it. Read more
items.author: Karen

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Sand, Blue, Apricot, Dim, Black, Coffee, Oatmeal, Roseberry, Navy, Khaki, White, Ivory, Toffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
